data.name: Term Savings
data.description: Invest your money securely with competitive fixed interest rates.

features.additionalInfo: Combined balances of up to $250,000 per account holder are guaranteed and secured by the Australian Government.
A guaranteed rate for terms from 1 to 24 months
Interest can be paid fortnightly, monthly, 12 monthly or at maturity.
Bank 24/7 wherever you are and whenever you want with RAB mobile and internet banking

constraints.additionalInfo: For deposits of $500,000 and over, rates are by negotiation and subject to acceptance.
A minimum $1,000 investment applies to this product.
A minimum $1,000 investment applies to this product.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.
As a customer-owned bank, customers must also become a shareholder of Regional Australia Bank to be eligible to open an account.

fees.name: Document Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per hour, or part thereof, when you request us to retrieve historical documents related to your account.

fees.name: Inactive Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies annually if there are no transactions on your membership in the preceding 12 months.

fees.name: Dormant Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies if there is no member generated transaction activity on your account for a period of seven (7) years.

fees.name: Duplicate Copy of Statement
fees.additionalInfo: Applies if you request a duplicate copy of a formal account statement.

fees.name: Cheque Deposit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to each cheque deposited to your account that is dishonoured by the drawer’s bank.

fees.name: Early Redemption Adminstration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee may apply when you request to redeem your deposit prior to the maturity date. A reduced Interest Rate applies in addition to this fee.

fees.name: Early Redemption Break Cost
fees.additionalInfo: When a Term Savings deposit is redeemed prior to the maturity date, the interest paid on your account will be reduced based on how much notice is provided and how far through the term. Details on how this is calculated are available on request.

depositRates.additionalInfo: Interest rate is per annum (p.a.) for deposits of $500,000 and over, rates are by negotiation and subject to acceptance. Alternative payment frequencies available include fortnightly, quarterly, and biannually.
